tasks.description: Ensure the application adheres to security requirements including data protection and secure uploads.
tasks.details: Implement JWT for authentication, secure image uploads, and parameterized queries to prevent SQL injection.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct security testing to ensure vulnerabilities are addressed and data protection measures are effective.

tasks.title: Perform Accessibility Checks
tasks.description: Ensure the application meets accessibility standards as per WCAG 2.1 guidelines.
tasks.details: Review UI components for accessibility compliance, including keyboard navigation and screen reader support.
tasks.testStrategy: Use accessibility testing tools to identify and fix any compliance issues.

tasks.title: Prepare for Deployment and CI/CD Setup
tasks.description: Set up CI/CD pipeline for automated testing and deployment to production.
tasks.details: Configure GitHub Actions for CI/CD to automate testing and deployment to Vercel or AWS.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the CI/CD pipeline by pushing changes and verifying that tests run and deployment occurs successfully.
